Pre-Game Insights: Andrew Jett predicts the Miami Marlins to win against the Philadelphia Phillies, considering Max Meyer's recent performance and the Marlins' strong offense.
The Phillies were out-hit 14-11 in a wild loss 9-5 to the Marlins in Saturday's game.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Marlins have hit a home run in three of their last four Sunday day games at LoanDepot Park.
Five of the last six games between the Phillies and Marlins at LoanDepot Park have gone OVER the total runs line.
Others: The pick in this article is the opinion of the writer, not a PickDawgz site consensus.
Andrew Jett has been writing about college, professional, and fantasy sports betting since 2013.
